items.name: static var descendRecursively: CFURLEnumeratorOptions
items.desc: The enumerator recurses into each subdirectory enumerated.

items.name: static var generateFileReferenceURLs: CFURLEnumeratorOptions
items.desc: The enumerator generates file reference URLs instead of file path URLs.

items.name: static var skipPackageContents: CFURLEnumeratorOptions
items.desc: The enumerator skips package directory contents.

items.name: static var includeDirectoriesPreOrder: CFURLEnumeratorOptions
items.desc: If provided along with the descendRecursively option, the recursive enumerator returns a directory’s URL before returning the URLs of the directory’s descendents.

items.name: static var includeDirectoriesPostOrder: CFURLEnumeratorOptions
items.desc: If provided along with the descendRecursively option, the recursive enumerator returns a directory’s URL after returning the URLs of the directory’s descendents.
